source:
%%sql

MERGE INTO crm_sanctioneddb.dim_businessunit AS target
USING (
    SELECT DISTINCT new_chemonicsrbuid AS Business_Unit_Id_nk,
           RBU.chem_abbreviation AS business_unit_desc_nk,
           hash(new_chemonicsrbuid, RBU.chem_abbreviation) AS audit_hash_cd_source
    FROM crm_query.new_chemonicsrbu RBU
    JOIN crm_query.opportunity O ON new_chemonicsrbuid = O.new_chemonicsrbuentity
    WHERE O.IsActive = 1 AND RBU.IsActive = 1
) AS source
ON target.Business_Unit_Id_nk = source.Business_Unit_Id_nk AND target.IsActive = 1
WHEN MATCHED AND target.audit_hash_cd <> source.audit_hash_cd_source THEN
    UPDATE SET effective_end_date = current_date(), IsActive = 0
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
    INSERT (Business_Unit_Id_nk, business_unit_desc_nk, audit_hash_cd, IsActive, effective_start_date, effective_end_date, date_created, date_updated_last, created_by, updated_by)
    VALUES (source.Business_Unit_Id_nk, source.business_unit_desc_nk, source.audit_hash_cd_source, 1, current_date(), '9999-12-31', current_date(), current_date(), current_user(), current_user());
